summary:
That’s the bottom line.”

Bill Belichick claimed that UNC being featured on “Hard Knocks”

was not a “good fit.” ZUMAPRESS.com

Belichick’s comments come just days after he claimed that Hudson had nothing to do with UNC’s football team during a brief interview on ESPN’s “SportsCenter.”

“That’s really off to the side, it’s a personal relationship. I mean, there was nobody to help me sort it out, so I was asking her to do it.”

Bill Belichick and Jordon Hudson on the red carpet before Super Bowl LIX NFL Honors at Saenger Theatre. She doesn’t have anything to do with UNC football,” Belichick said during the broadcast on Tuesday. Belichick said that since there was no one running the sports information department for the team, he requested Hudson, 24, to be copied on the emails.
